title: Jean Mackenzie
subtitle: Hundreds of migrants have gone on hunger strike at Vucjak refugee camp in Bosnia because of poor conditions. There’s no electricity and the tents are unfit for winter. They say they’ll freeze to death if they have to stay any longer and want the EU to let them cross the border. pic.twitter.com/dV3vxeMhIy
